Time travel to the future: People could potentially travel back in time and change their biological age to a younger state, allowing them to live a longer life in the future.
Reverse aging process: The ability to change biological age could lead to the development of treatments that reverse the aging process, potentially allowing people to live indefinitely.

Superhero society: People with the ability to change their biological age could become superheroes, using their powers to fight crime and save the world.

Biological evolution: The ability to change biological age could lead to the evolution of the human species, as people with the ability to live longer and healthier lives would have a competitive advantage in the gene pool.
